Xceptance Load Test integrates htmlunit as there are some changes required to work around problems or to make it usable by Xceptance Load Test.
This file contains the names of the files (classes) that were changed as required by the Apache License 2.0 in such a case.

The following classes where changed to work around some problems or be able to use Xceptance Load Test together with htmlunit:
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.xpath.XPathUtils
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.BaseFrame
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomElement
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlForm
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlHiddenInput
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlImage
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.background.JavaScriptExecutionJob
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.host.css.CSSStyleSheet
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.host.xml.XMLDocument
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.regexp.HtmlUnitRegExpProxy
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.regexp.RegExpJsToJavaConverter
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.javascript.JavaScriptEngine
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.BrowserVersion
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.HttpWebConnection
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.SocksSocketFactory
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequest
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebResponse
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebWindowImpl

Files that were added compared to the original htmlunit fall under the terms and conditions of Xceptance Load Test as stated in the license conditions in the user manual.
